settings.soundCreateHint: Play a sound when creating a request (button click)
settings.soundActivateHint: Play a sound when activating a request (click on someone's request as GM)
settings.messageActivateHint: If enabled, a message will be send in the chat when a request is activated
settings.reqClickSoundHint: Path to the file for the sound when activating a request
settings.useForRequestsHint: Choose what will be used for the name and image of your requests. If the "Custom" option is selected, you can specify the name and image file path in the setting below
settings.customImageHint: Path to the image for requests (if the "Custom" option is selected)
settings.customNameHint: Name for requests (if the "Custom" option is selected)
settings.chatQueueHeight: Height of the request queue below the chat
settings.chatQueueHeightHint: Height of the request queue element (default is 60)
settings.requestsPositionHint: With "Free on screen" selected, you can freely move the requests window around the entire FoundryVTT window. Hovering over the requests window while holding "Shift" will reveal a button that toggles this setting when pressed
settings.freeScreenZIndexHint: zIndex of the Requests Window when the "Free on screen" option is selected in the "Requests window position" setting
settings.widthDependOnQueue: Width depends on the number of requests
settings.widthDependOnQueueHint: If active, the width of the requests field in the Free Window will depend on the number of requests, setting the minimum possible width
settings.selectedActorId: ID of the Actor selected for requests
settings.selectedActorIdHint: The actor with this ID will be used for requests if the "Token/Image of the selected actor" option is selected in the "What to use for requests" setting
settings.soundCreateVolume: Sound volume when creating a request
settings.soundCreateVolumeHint: Volume is set as a percentage from 0% to 100% (50% by default)
settings.soundActivateVolume: Sound volume when activating a request
settings.soundActivateVolumeHint: Volume is set as a percentage from 0% to 100% (50% by default)
settings.useFoundryInterfaceVolumeHint: If enabled, the volume of creating and activating requests will be equal to the volume of the FoundryVTT interface.
settings.visualNovelSync: Synchronizing requests with Visual Novel Dialogues
settings.visualNovelSyncHint: If active, requests will be synchronized with requests of the "Visual Novel Dialogues" module
